title: Looking for a silver or bronze mid laner willing to be a sub
body:
adc: igetcarried
supp: me
jg: revoltedsin
top: justin12
mid: ??

let me know if you want to be our sub, add me or put a post!

replies.body: I can play/ sub as I main mid lane but I cannot tonight (July 28th), but I can tommorrow!
i can sub for mid or any other role you need. add me in game to talk more if you want
I'm interested... When do you guys most commonly play? I have work weekdays during the day, but nights and weekends I'm free fairly often.
